files.patch:
@@ -336,2 +336,2 @@
-	elif [ -r $(TOPDIR)/.src-rev ]; then \
-	    echo "SOURCE=\"$$($(CAT) $(TOPDIR)/.src-rev | $(SED) -e 's/:/:git:/' -e 's/  *$$//')\"" >> $@ ; \
+	elif [ -n "$(SRCREV)" -a -r $(SRCREV) ]; then \
+	    echo "SOURCE=\"$$($(CAT) $(SRCREV) | $(SED) -e 's/:/:git:/' -e 's/  *$$//')\"" >> $@ ; \
